hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah bought some food from a Jew with payment to be made later, and he put his shield in pledge for that

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَشْتَرِي الطَّعَامَ إِلَى أَجَلٍ وَيَسْتَرْهِنُ الْبَائِعَ مِنْهُ بِالثَّمَنِ رَهْنًا .
chapter.eng-name: A man Buying food with Payment to be Made Later, and the Seller Asking for something as Collateral for this Price
